entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
